thread.title: Psych exams order for teen suspects in Lapeer school threat case
thread.title_full: Psych exams order for teen suspects in Lapeer school threat case

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Psych exams order for teen suspects in Lapeer school threat case
text: The teens face several charges including conspiracy to commit first-degree murder, making a terrorist threat, using a computer to commit a crime, and conspiracy to commit a terrorist act after police began an investigation Feb. 20 following a threat made against the Oregon Drive school in Mayfield Township.
